snippet: While the possible purchase price is said to be relatively small - in the $20 million to $40 million range - it would represent an investment in the growing market of online video.
abstract: While the possible purchase price is said to be relatively small - in the $20 million to $40 million range - it would represent an investment in the growing market of online video.

headline.main: Discovery Is Said to Pursue Revision3, a Web Video Company
